name: project-2600-root
description: Orchestration scripts for MERN stack project.

scripts._comment1: // 1. DEVELOPMENT SCRIPT (runs both client and server locally)
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts._comment2: // 2. INSTALLATION SCRIPT (installs dependencies in both folders)
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.render-build: npm run install-all && npm run build
scripts._comment3: // 3. DEPLOYMENT BUILD SCRIPT (Tells the hosting service to build the client)
scripts._comment4: // NOTE: Many hosting services (like Render) look for this exact script name
scripts.render-postbuild: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
